content: The Celtics bested the Warriors by out-Warriorsing the Warriors. It took an inspired effort from the entire rotation, but Boston proved that it has the weapons to disrupt the Warriors’ modern game plan. Add this game to the memo on how to beat the Warriors: play smart and so fucking hard that you scare Kerr into making weird decisions in the name of conserving his stars. Beat the Warriors by daring them to beat themselves.
